title: Surprise S rank's
body:
So basically i had a rumble game where i just got an S-, just wondering since it's now always being announced.

Anyone been getting any random times where they actually managed to hit an S ranking (and were shocked at the fact)?

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/128441647/200474676

That's my rumble S-, i felt like i was useless (still trying to learn to play him) but apparently i actually managed to do a decent amount in the end, to the point of the S-.

replies.body: The ranks are done under a bell curve, so the less people that play a champ in a role, the easier it is to earn a higher rank. e.g. Ahri mid would need a great KDA, CS, kill participation, etc, while a champ like Urgot in any role will earn it with an more forgiving score. I haven't gotten any surprising ones yet, but I don't play many uncommon champs/roles myself.

In my last game, I was 21/0 and only got an A+

So triggered.
i got my only s+ on urgot support, its all about that unplayed shit.

Gratz~
One of the reason could be that it's a champ thats lest popular than others, so the ranking record, if u would call it, is bit easier to achive higher rank? 

I remember playing one game with ashe, doing very well yet only got an A ranking 
T-T so sad....
